public class StatisticsController
extends java.lang.Object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clickApply()
    Checks if the selection in the ComboBoxes is valid If not: shows an alert If yes: start evaluation
    void clickClose()
    Closes the stage, gets called when btnClose gets clicked
    boolean completeReset()
    Tries to completely reset the database Shows messages in case it fails
    boolean evaluateDataClientHeavy()
    A former approach to evaluate data This approach loads tables with all their data from db into ArrayLists and evaluates them in java.
    boolean evaluateDataDBHeavy()
    Resets all labels, selects data from db Then calls updateGUI to fill GUI with new information
    void fillPieChart()
    Fills the pieChart with data from the db
    void initialize()
    Sets initial values to gui elements
    void prePositionWaitAlert​(javafx.stage.Window window)
    Calls a method to open and immediately close the waiting window again This ensures the window will be positioned correctly when called the next time

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Sets initial values to gui elements

    • completeReset

      public boolean completeReset()
      Tries to completely reset the database Shows messages in case it fails
      Returns:
      true if the reset was successful

    • clickApply

      public void clickApply()
      Checks if the selection in the ComboBoxes is valid If not: shows an alert If yes: start evaluation

    • evaluateDataDBHeavy

      public boolean evaluateDataDBHeavy()
      Resets all labels, selects data from db Then calls updateGUI to fill GUI with new information
      Returns:
      false if a database operation fails, otherwise true

    • evaluateDataClientHeavy

      public boolean evaluateDataClientHeavy()
      A former approach to evaluate data This approach loads tables with all their data from db into ArrayLists and evaluates them in java. This method is currently out of use
      Returns:
      false if a database operation fails, otherwise true

    • clickClose

      public void clickClose()
      Closes the stage, gets called when btnClose gets clicked

    • prePositionWaitAlert

      public void prePositionWaitAlert​(javafx.stage.Window window)
      Calls a method to open and immediately close the waiting window again This ensures the window will be positioned correctly when called the next time
      Parameters:
      window - The window the alert should be centered on

    • fillPieChart

      public void fillPieChart()
      Fills the pieChart with data from the db
